title: Make My Day!
summary: A stress-free learning environment for instructors and students. One questions a day.
description: Students in a class get one question a day by email or SMS or WhatsApp from their instructor at a time of their choice (e.g., morning 8 AM). By taking few minutes every day to answer one question, they improve their skills steadily throughout the semester. The questions are relevant to what is going on in class that week. If they give a correct answer, the system reinforces their answer and gives them more details. Otherwise, it tells when why they are wrong and tells them more information about the correct answer. There may also be optional reading material on the question for the student to learn more.

title: Churn Detection Modeling
summary: Combating customer churn for for IT software provider Kaseya.
description: Kaseya is a cloud-based IT and security software company that allows consumers to deliver IT services and help drive business needs. Recently, the company has been interested in preventing voluntary customer departures as effectively as possible. To effectively target customers who have a greater likelihood to leave, Kaseya has been interested in implementing a churn detection model. we are looking to implementing a model that predicts the likelihood of the customer leaving based on a couple of factors.
